page.title: 19Government and Politics.
page.content: The area covered by this block is governed by the Holmfirth Parish Council. This council looks after problems which arise. The village of Holme provides a councillor for this council and so do the other villages in the area. If advice is needed on any problems arising the council will ask the council above them to help. The council above is called Kirklees Metropotitan Council for this is a Metropolitan area. Above this council is the West Yorkshire Metropotitan County Council then the Parliamentary Constituency which is Huddersfield South and last the E.E.C. Parliament. The MP for this area is Mr. Richard Wainwright of the Liberals but he is retiring at the next local elections. Mr. T. Megahy is the Euro MP for the whole of this part of West Yorkshire. He is a member of the Labour Party.
